title: EKKO BUG RIOT PLEASE FIX
body: While playing ekko in game multiple people complained about lagging and i experienced consult dc this hasnt happened in my prior games i tried to fix the problem myself but nothing improved now i am unable to rejoin my ranked game due to a error that if never seen before please fix

replies.body:
That's a misleading title. You describe lag and disconnection, but the title suggests it's a **bug** specifically for **Ekko**.

What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
